comments.content:
**[Palette BQ](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317120823/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Berthold&ffam=Palette%20BQ%20-%20Regular&fid=938078848dadc5e773f487162c6ee84e&fsize=60&text=El%20hombre%20tieme.%20Si%20no%2C%20la%20guerra&wrap=2)** by Martin Wilke [1950] available from Berthold.  
There is also Bitstream's version: **[Brush455](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317120823/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Bitstream&ffam=Brush455%20BT%20-%20Regular&fid=22e4a3e4da3e888b3a01909f9ce618bc&fsize=60&text=El%20hombre%20tieme.%20Si%20no%2C%20la%20guerra&wrap=2)**
